channel.title: First Person
channel.description: I was thinking about making my client into a first person client... so then I looked up what it would look like and I got this. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N7uxArYsojE&feature=relmfu]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N7uxArYsojE&feature=relmfu[/url] I've also been screwing around with the camera's position and the yCameraTurn but can't find a solution... This might be asking for alot :0 anyideas? -

item.title: First Person

I was thinking about making my client into a first person client… so then I looked up what it would look like and I got this.
